definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: And, from Budapest to Brasília, an abundance of credit fuelled domestic demand.
sentences.chinese: 從布達佩斯到巴西利亞，大量的貸款推動了內需。

sentences.english: He was born in Budapest, Hungary in eighteen seventy-four.
sentences.chinese: 他出生在布達佩斯，匈牙利一八七四年。

sentences.english: Budapest's Buda Castle possesses many priceless works of art.
sentences.chinese: 布達佩斯的布達城堡擁有許多珍貴的藝術作品。

sentences.english: Welcome to Four Seasons Hotel Gresham Palace Budapest.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎光臨格雷舍姆宮布達佩斯四季酒店。

sentences.english: It's like the Prague Spring all over again, but only here in Budapest.
sentences.chinese: 這就像布拉格之春一遍，但只有在這裏在布達佩斯。

sentences.english: Budapest follows in position 73 and Ljubljana in 77.
sentences.chinese: 布達佩斯如下位置73和77盧布爾雅那。

sentences.english: This morning Stefano Domenicali came back to Budapest.
sentences.chinese: 今天早晨多梅回到布達佩斯。

sentences.english: In 1899, musical conductor Eugene Ormandy was born in Budapest, Hungary.
sentences.chinese: 1899年，音樂指揮家尤金匈牙利布達佩斯出生。

sentences.english: So scientists at Eotvos University in Budapest decided to do just that.
sentences.chinese: 所以布達佩斯厄特沃什大學的科學家決定做這個求證。
布達佩斯位於河的兩旁。

sentences.english: Budapest's Keleti Station is a wonderful place to start a great journey.
sentences.chinese: 布達佩斯蓋萊迪火車站是開始一次偉大旅行的好地方。

sentences.english: A woman relaxed in the Szechenyi Bath thermal complex on a cold morning in Budapest Friday.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷的清晨，一個女人在熱泳池裏休息，布達佩斯。

definition: Yekaterinburg (Russian city, also known as Ekaterinburg or Sverdlovsk)
Dresden, capital of Saxony 薩克森州|萨克森州[Sa4 ke4 sen1 zhou1], Germany
